mapper.update: update cross_box set update_operator_name = #{updateOperatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yn = 0, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cross_box
original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
original_dms_name = #{originalDmsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
destination_dms_name = #{destinationDmsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_one_id = #{transferOneId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transfer_one_name = #{transferOneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_two_id = #{transferTwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transfer_two_name = #{transferTwoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_three_id = #{transferThreeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transfer_three_name = #{transferThreeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
full_line = #{fullLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_operator_name = #{updateOperatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn = 1
mapper.select: select full_line from cross_box where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn =1

select
from cross_box where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn =1 limit 1

select
from cross_box where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn =2 and effective_date= #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select
from cross_box
order by id desc
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select full_line from cross_box where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id=#{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn =1

select
from cross_box where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (yn =1 or yn=2) and rownum = 1
select full_line from cross_box where original_dms_id = #{originalDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and destination_dms_id = #{destinationDmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and yn =1
